attributes.action: Close Down HM Government e-petition site
attributes.additional_details:
The recent petition and subsequent debate and "vote" in the House of Commons on the referendum on the EU, has clearly shown that this site is of no value and the wishes of the British public are being ignored by the present government.
Even if we get sufficient signatures to force a "debate" the "House" will do as it pleases and deny the public their wishes.
I move to have this site closed down as any “debate” forced will not result in the wishes of the signatories being carried out.
